scripts.install-all: npm install && bower install && cd front && tsd install && cd ../back && tsd install
scripts.front-build-dev: npm run front-clean && npm run front-typescript && npm run front-browserify-dev
scripts.front-build-prod: npm run front-clean && npm run front-typescript && npm run front-browserify-prod && npm run front-uglify
scripts.front-watch: npm run front-build-dev && parallelshell "npm run front-watch-typescript" "npm run front-watch-browserify" "npm run front-serve"
scripts.watch: npm run back-build-dev && npm run front-build-dev && parallelshell "npm run back-typescript-watch"  "npm run back-serve" "npm run front-watch-typescript" "npm run front-watch-browserify"
scripts.build: npm run front-build-prod && npm run back-build-dev
